name: PixelOS GD Alpha
description:
PixelOS GD is an OS emulator I created to teach myself to code.

Password is "password"

Version 0.1

Note, the wallpapers (other than caylian isles), and the music was NOT made by me, credit goes to their original creators.

Another note, to get PixelOS working on Linux, you will need Wine. Once installed, PixelOS will run with no issues. - https://www.winehq.org/

PixelOS is also open source: https://github.com/PixelGamer6632/PixelOS-GD-Beta1

Want to keep up with updates and new announcements? Join the Discord - https://discord.gg/2gGxVuntue
